text: رَبَّنَا وَأَدۡخِلۡهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمۡ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
translation: 8. Rabbigayow! Gali kuwaasi Beeraha negaya (Jannada) ee aad u ballan qaadday, iyo kuwa wanaagsan oo ka mid ah aabbayaashood iyo xaasaskooda iyo ubadkooda. Waxaad Adigu tahay (Allow) Adkaadaha Sarreeya, Xakiimka ah.
